title: I cannt make missions anymore
body: I have a question about this project skins and icons missions... When will i receive new missions? I have 3 days since i did my last one and the event is still on and ending in 5 days if i remember right.. Whats going on? I also bought a skin allrdy but the missions is for 5 more days so why i dont get any new one?

replies.body: Looks like you've already completed all of them. You went through each of The Cop missions 1-4, The Vigilante 1-4, The Artist 1-4, and then completed "The End of the Hunt".

You have a set amount of mission this Project update. They are firstly, the project icon mission, then follow the 4 missions per new project skin, therefore 12., and then after, a 14th mission which gives you the project emote. In order to go onto the next mission, you must finish the one before it first.
